name: Easterminigolf
description:
Supposed to be an entry for Pygame Community Easter Jam 2023, but i was late =(


Controls:
  • Press LMB to grab controls of an egg.
  • Aim with mouse, holding LMB.
  • Pull back throwing power meter.
  • Release LMB to make a carefull strike.
  • Avoid orange spikes and black crawling bubble-goo.
  • Try to get an egg to the black hole.
  • PROFIT!
